DellOemSensor.description: This is the complex property for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF Sensor Schema.
DellOemSensor.longDescription: This is the complex property for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF Sensor Schema. This shall be used to represent an OEM Sensor for a Redfish implementation.

GetHistoricalSensorReadings.description: An action to retrieve historical readings of the sensor.
GetHistoricalSensorReadings.longDescription: An action to retrieve historical readings of the sensor. The action shall accept a parameter ReadingHistoryPeriod to specify the period for which the readings shall be returned.

title: #DellOemSensor
